summary: England, 1795: the young Catherine has just married Charles Fengriffen and moves into his castle. She becomes the victim of an old curse that lays on the family. On her wedding night she is raped by a ghost and gets pregnant.
cast: Peter Cushing|Herbert Lom|Patrick Magee|Stephanie Beacham|Ian Ogilvy|Geoffrey Whitehead|Guy Rolfe|Rosalie Crutchley|Gillian Lind|Sally Harrison|Janet Key|John Sharp|Norman Mitchell|Lloyd Lamble|Kay Adrian|David Barclay|Blake Butler|Vic Chapman|Frank Forsyth|Daniel Johns|Hilary Martyn|Sylvester Morand|Beth Owen|Toni Sinclair|Elsa Smith|John Stamp|Larry Taylor|Rocky Taylor|Gloria Maley|Drew Wood|Michael Elphick|Bill Hemmings|Del Watson
keywords: wife raped in front of husband|attacked by a dog|facial birthmark|exclamation point in title|rottweiler
title: Ahora empiezan los gritos
